name: Fxos-close-all-addon
tagline: Add on to close all windows from the FxOS task manager
body:
Close All Add-On
================

A new button in the task manager to close all (closable) windows.

[Download the package](./dist/close-all-addon.zip)

See https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox_OS/Spark#Add-ons for details on Firefox OS add-ons
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
